Title: Personnel Costs
Description: Salaries for research staff including scientists and technicians

Title: Laboratory Equipment
Description: Purchase of specialized equipment for viral analysis

Title: Supplies
Description: Consumables such as reagents, swabs, and PPE

Title: Data Analysis Software
Description: Licensing costs for data analysis tools

Title: Collaborative Research
Description: Funding for collaborative studies with partner institutions

Title: Publication Fees
Description: Costs associated with publishing research findings

Title: Travel Expenses
Description: Travel costs for conference attendance and fieldwork

Title: Indirect Costs
Description: Overhead costs associated with the research facilities
